opinion.attorneys:
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Charles J. Rogers, Jr., Providence, for defendant.Page 97
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] ORDER [2] The defendant is directed to file the transcript in this case with the clerk of the Superior Court forthwith. Upon the filing of said transcript, the said clerk shall promptly transmit the record to this court.
[3] DORIS, J., did not participate.
